title: Normal
description: Can sex fulfil your every need? Eddie and her mistress spend their weekends soaked in sex; orgies and private parties exploring every facet of human sexuality, but is it enough? When Eddie and Madame play with Alain, he has a strange and unnerving effect on Eddie. The encounter leaves her questioning her relationship with Madame and the life they lead. Torn between the known and unknown...who and what will Eddie choose?
author: Ruby Kiddell
